TextLibrary.Text: Sable
I was told Nasty Butler approved of how we handled the selected Pirate.
I was told Nasty Butler approved of how we handled the selected Pirate.
That's good to hear, but is that all the demonstration he needs to trust us with prototype technology?
We? Hardly. I manned the guns AND piloted the ship while you sat in the back, meditating!
Your intutition is correct, that is not all he will require of us.
Perhaps that was what it looked like to you. In truth I was practicing the ancient technique of Battle Meditation, subtly influencing the entire outcome of the battle.
Alright, what's next on the agenda then?
I heard you snoring. . .
It would seem we have been asked to gather 20 tons of Alloys as a proof that we are capable of obtaining needed resources.
Hmm, that is compelling evidence against me. Would you believe I was DREAMING of using Battle Meditation?
Does he actually NEED these Alloys for anything?
I don't buy that.
I was told he is going to melt them down and have them used to form a statue of a penguin, but they could just be trying to mess with my head. The MRI have been known to do that, being telepaths.
Alright, would you believe I was dreaming about turtles?
You have got to be kidding me.
That'll do. Back onto the matter at hand, what is it that Mr. Butler has in mind for us now?
I wish I was. Anyway, we are to deliver these to his home on Serpens III once we have them.
He wants us to gather 20 Alloys, probably via mining, and deliver them to his home on Serpens III.
Alright, let's get going then.
Alright, let's get moving.
